description.value:
This exquisite fiddle is perfectly carved and balanced to produce the purest sound while granting its player perfect balance and poise. It grants a +2 item bonus to Performance checks. If you're a master in Performance, while playing it you also gain a +1 status bonus to Reflex saves and a +1 item bonus to Dexterity-based skill checks. If you're legendary in Performance, the bonuses are +2.

When you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Perform]{Perform} with the fiddle, you can choose to create a harsh and discordant note. You critically fail the Performance check, shred the strings of the fiddle, and create an 8th-level @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Sound Burst]{Sound Burst}, with a @Template[type:emanation|distance:40] around you instead of a @Template[type:burst|distance:10]. The fiddle can't be played again until the strings are replaced at a cost of 200 gp.

Activate Cast a Spell

Effect You expend a number of charges from this instrument to cast a spell from its list.

    • Cantrips@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Dancing Lights]{Dancing Lights}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Ghost Sound]{Ghost Sound}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Message]{Message}
    • 1st@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Command]{Command}
    • 2nd@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Calm Emotions]{Calm Emotions}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Faerie Fire]{Faerie Fire}
    • 3rd@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Enthrall]{Enthrall}
    • 4th@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Glibness]{Glibness}
    • 5th@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Sending]{Sending}
    • 6th@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Calm Emotions]{Calm Emotions}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Dominate]{Dominate}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Vibrant Pattern]{Vibrant Pattern}
    • 7th@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Dominate]{Dominate}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Prismatic Spray]{Prismatic Spray}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.True Target]{True Target}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Vibrant Pattern]{Vibrant Pattern}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Visions of Danger]{Visions of Danger}

Craft Requirements Supply one casting of all listed levels of all listed spells.
